item.title: Edith add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Choose your love. Love your choice." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Edith add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Edith add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Remember who you are and what God expects you to become." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Edith add a quote by Dianne Christner
item.description: "Something Blue" is now available on Netgalley for reviewers!" -- Dianne Christner

item.title: Edith add a quote by Joseph Fielding Smith
item.description: "Satan has control now. No matter where you look, he is in control, even in our own land. He is guiding the governments as far as the Lord will permit him. That is why there is so much strife, turmoil, and confusion all over the earth. One master mind is governing the nations. It is not the president of the United States; it is not Hitler; it is not Mussolini; it is not the king or government of England or any other land; it is Satan himself." -- Joseph Fielding Smith
